website_summaries.verdict: The best portable inflator to keep around for mobile use. Small enough to fit in a bag. Great for on-the-go use like on a bicycle.
pros: A great carrying case keeps the unit contained with accessories
cons: Can take longer to inflate larger things like car tires

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 years old and a disabled female. I have been relying on many tire centers to check the air in my car for me when I have to go out of town and it was embarrassing. I decided to get this and it is soooo easy to use. I love it and now I can do it myself. Come to find out, the tire centers had way too much air in my tires and that is why my car was driving squirrely. I highly recommend this for people like myself. It gives you peace of mind just having it in the car!
customer_reviews.author: Bama Mama

customer_reviews.title: Did not last for nearly $50
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of crap. Lasted four tire inflations and died. I thought it may have just shutdown from overheating. Tried it a week later didn't work. Checked fuse; was intact. I know my way around electronics and obviously is a power issue so guess I have to fix it myself...
customer_reviews.author: Doody2325

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL - COMPACT - AUTOMATIC
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of driving all over the place to find a tire inflation station that works. When one is found I may or may not have change and one feeding may or may not provide time for checking all tires. This little machine is small and powerful. It took two tires from about 27lbs to 32lbs in a very short time with automatic stop. So nice to be able to do this at home on the two cars in our family.
customer_reviews.author: ACA327

customer_reviews.title: Little Wonder!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little wonder. Many advantages compared to refilling the air of your tires in the gas station. > Convenience - do it at your own garage or driveway. > Sanitary - Most gas station air hoses are filthy and greasy (gross). > Cost - Most gas stations (California) charge for the use of air and water. Also, save gas by not driving to the gas station. > Emergency - Keep it in your car for whenever you need it. > Great and inexpensive gift like birthdays or father's day (I need another one). lol!
customer_reviews.author: Teknoray

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS LIKE I GOT A LEMON ALSO
customer_reviews.text: LOOKS LIKE I GOT A LEMON ALSO. IT WORKED AS ADVERTISED 2 TIMES AND THEN QUIT. CHANGED FUSE AND TRIED IN 3 DIFFERENT RECEPTACLES TO NO AVAIL. EVEN LIGHTS WOULDN'T WORK. CHECKED P.I. STORES ONLINE AND SEARCHED FOR ITEM. GOT "NO RESULTS FOUND". THEN TRIED TO CONTACT P.I. STORES AND RECEIVED "SEND MESSAGE" PROMPT. WHEN I HIT SEND AFTER TYPING MESSAGE NOTHING HAPPENED. NO PHONE NUMBER FOR CONTACT. NEEDLESS TO SAY, I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS ITEM.
customer_reviews.author: James S. Brimm

customer_reviews.title: WHAT AN AMAZING LITTLE MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: This pump has taught this 74 yr old lady to inflate a tire for the very first time. I followed the instructions to the letter and had no problem. The pump did as it said it would do. I did loose 5# of air trying to place that itty bitty cap back on the tire stem but that was the fault of my stiff fingers and nothing to do with the pump. I have now used it twice for a slow leaking tire and I would highly recommend this pump. It sure brings peace of mind. I love the carry case and had no problem storing the cords into the back of the pump. How convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it few weeks ago, got Nissan Pathfinder, quite big tires. First I was concerned by the compact aspect of the product but could very easily topped all 4 tires from 30 to 36 PSI. No special heat and very efficient automatic stop. Just go quick to unscrew from the valve after inflation to not loose any pressure. This morning a pressure warning forced me to stop the car pretty much nowhere, this small inflator saved my day, a piece of metal was screwed in one tyre and left the pressure down to 24 PSI. I could inflate to 40 PSI time to reach a handy mechanic who repaired the tire.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Item had an issue, but the vendor resolved it immediately
customer_reviews.text: Update: The vendor reached out to me within hours of my reporting an issue in the review, and has gone above and beyond to make it right. I have added a star as a result. It is vendors like this one that make online shopping a pleasure. I wish more were like this. So if you are looking for a vendor that cares about customer satisfaction and affordable items, I highly recommend P.I. Auto Store. Old review: It works but slowly. Button fell off the very first time using it. Still works, but button cap flies off all the time. Not bad for a budget device.
customer_reviews.author: Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Auto stop needs to be better explained
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a newer model than many of the previous reviews cover, the hose clips on versus screws on. The device does NOT Automatically Shut Off. It does automatically stop inflating when the pressure selected is reached. Then you still have to shut the pump off manually or it keeps running, just not inflating. The main title claims Auto Shut Off and some parts of the description say turns off automatically. Several videos of the older model clearly demonstrate the pump automatically shutting off. Otherwise it works as expected. People complaining about air escaping the tire when connecting or disconnecting the pump may not understand that this is how a tire valve works.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Broken after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other reviews, I used this less than 10 times over the course of 3 months and am having issues with the pump. My issue is the pump fails to inflate past 15 psi. I tried using a different valve head to verify that was not the problem. That made no difference. I've tried contacting their support line and have yet to receive a response e-mail. As stated by others...Unfortunately, the return window has closed for me, otherwise it would be on its way back! **UPDATE** I was contacted by P.I.Stores. They were very easy to work with in resolving this issue. I would gladly purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton W. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product about two years ago. I love it! It has worked without issue and been dependable. I am a single female and can easily use this device. It has kept me out of being stranded on at least one occasion. Basically, it’s a comfort to know I have it when I need it. And with weather temp fluctuations, it’s well worth the investment just for the convenience alone. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PureHeart30

customer_reviews.title: From opening box to "Back on the road" was a total of 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: My tire was down to 20psi. My van was driving lopsided, I was far from home, and the "low tire" warning light was coming on. I pulled over, found this auto-pump I'd purchased from Amazon in my back seat, and began to hope it did what said it would do. I opened the box, figured out the long cord must go into the cigarette lighter, and the instructions said to first plug in the tire pump, view the existing tire pressure, then use the up/down arrows to set the desired pressure. I did as directed, and set the tire to stop filling at 35psi. Worked as directed. Began driving, no more wobbly, and no more tire warning light.
customer_reviews.author: Winston

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in an emergency
customer_reviews.text: You never know what you miss until you don't have it. I was at my sister's house and had to use their analog pump in the middle of a cold night without a light. Trying to attach the pump with my cell phone light just didn't work well. That's when I appreciated all the features of the P.I. AUTO STORE - Tire Inflator. The large backlit LCD display and the LED light would have been handy. I already have 2 for both my cars and decided to get another for sis's husband... The perfect Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I am buying another.
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing a number of similar products, i chose this to try. We were at a home miles from a service station with a slow leak. I had this delivered prime and it worked great. We have a Suburban and it easily reached all tires. I was able to make it to a service station and get it repaired without using AAA. It worked perfectly. It is small, compact and easily stored and we have added this to our permanent travel kit. I am buying one for our other home and retiring the large compresser I have to haul out when I fill the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha L

customer_reviews.title: So Handy To Have!
customer_reviews.text: So Handy To Have! I purchased the P.I. Auto Store - Premium 12V DC Tire Air Compressor Pump, Portable Digital Auto Tire Inflator .....NEW IMPROVED VERSION..... With Carry Case because last week I ha mjo blowout on the interstate and when I got the small apare out to put on, it was FLAT! I nve want to be in that predicament again so I ordered this and it will remain in my car! This had good ratings and appears to be a quality item. It comes in a nice case and it is compact and easy to carry in the trunk of my car. This gives me peace of mind that nothing like that will ever happen to me again.
customer_reviews.author: lawlf

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good device
customer_reviews.text: I echo all of the positive comments made by the other folks about the unit's design, portab, easy to use, etc. The only reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5 is that the digital pressure meter isn't quite as accurate as I had hoped. My car has automatic tire pressure measurement (TPM) system, and after I inflated all 4 tires using the same 31 psi setting, I got readings varying between 30.2 and 31.5psi. Not a huge deal, at this price point I am more than happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: UGA Rugger

customer_reviews.title: Effective, economical, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. Reading the online literature, including the Q&As, was helpful in understanding how the thing works. Despite the concern expressed by some, I had very little problem with air loss while attaching and disconnecting the air hose. Inflation was pretty quick, and I like the built-in digital pressure gauge. I plan on carrying this tool in my vehicle, so for expediency I stow it in a slightly larger carrying case than the snug one which was provided. Time will tell whether it is durable, but it seems a great value. The manufacturer sent me a 20% coupon, and I plan on buying another of these as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Tenery

customer_reviews.title: Tire Inflator 12V DC Air Compressor
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this compressor! Super easy to use, I think, it is one of the best buys I've made for last years! Thank you very much! HIGHLY recommend! I have an update on my purchase -- it's been a month (not too long time) but I've used this tire inflator a few times and it is super easy to use and VERY helpful product! I am driving a lot and I think, drivers (mostly women, like me) must have this (or similar, even though I am happy with this particular one) inflator. Thanks a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Sarmat

customer_reviews.title: I love the digital read out
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 (1 for each car). I wanted to try them out. My neighbor had a truck that had been sitting for a while......the tires were at 22 lbs. I set the PI inflators for 35 pounds and let them run. When they stopped and we checked the pressure on each tire....they were right on the money. I love the digital read out.......all other inflators I have had in the past had a pressure gauge with a needle that wig-wagged back and forth +/- 10 lbs. I spent more time disconnecting and checking with a tire gauge than I did inflating. I am sold on this item.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Timmons

customer_reviews.title: poor design
customer_reviews.text: It let me select my PSI the first time then became locked in at that value. Any attempt to change the value and it might change but not show you on the display you would just have to randomly guess. When filling a tire it would fill to your PSI setting but if you disconnected and reconnected the cord somehow the tire had lost 2 PSI in the readout. Very indecisive readout that would randomly jump about even when connected to the tire. Would have to turn it on, let the tire fill, turn it off, wait a few seconds, PSI would change, turn it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gasorek

customer_reviews.title: Handy Item to have
customer_reviews.text: The compressor works as advertised. With gas stations charging for Air and the inconvenience of having to fill tires at a station, this product saves time and aggravation. Not to mention, it's in your car. I had a slow leak in a tire on my Ford Expedition. No time to get it plugged or replaced. Saved me and my tire tread until I got tire fixed. Change of season, normal loss of air pressure, no worries. This is my second unit. First one is 3 years old and it works like new. This unit is for my son's car. It's a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...intuitive...compact storage
customer_reviews.text: I've only needed to use this tire inflator once since buying it, but it worked great. Although I read the instructions, it was intuitive to use. Very compact. I ended up putting it on the floor of the back seat rather than in the trunk because it takes up so little room. I have to say that the email contact from P.I. Stores has been an unexpected bonus. In fact, they helped me straighten out a problem with Amazon! I don't need much in the way of automotive products, but I'll definitely check out P.I. Stores on Amazon first when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Bruner

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Digital Inflator
customer_reviews.text: Good tire inflator! I purchased this for my second car and i`ve used it twice since i got it and works GREAT! Very compact design and easy to use with digital lcd for better readings, comes with a small bag where you can store it including the extra adapters to be used on bicycles, balls etc. Long 12V cable
customer_reviews.author: Marquino Gadget guru

customer_reviews.title: I like having the ability to quickly air up the tires ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had to seldom use this inflator so took time to review. I find it works well. I like having the ability to quickly air up the tires no matter where I am. The instant read out gauge lets you quickly check the pressure and a flick of the on/off button airs up the tire. And it comes with a durable case and stores easily in my car trunk. Does it air up a tire fast? Well, it airs them up fairly quickly. Sure it is not a 125 pound pressure 1 horsepower garage system, but try getting into that garage to use theirs? If you don't want to get stuck, just try this out.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind In The Truck
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of the Portable P.I. AUTO Air Compressor /Tire Inflator. We have two cars and the first purchase worked so well, decided to purchase one for the other car. It is compact and easily fits the storage area of today's cars. You simply connect it to the valve stem of the tire, set the desired tire pressure and turn it on. It automatically stops when the desired pressure is reach - NO NEED FOR A TIRE AIR GAGE! Thankfully I have not needed to use any of the emergency features, but can see where they are a nice bonus. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jim G.

customer_reviews.title: Okay inflator
customer_reviews.text: I use it only for my tires on my passenger vehicle. It works as good as most of the low cost consumer air pumps. Noisy for sure. Accuracy....pretty close I would say...if you want real accuracy you have to spend around $300 and up for a more professional inflator. Certainly beats any inflator at the gas station (never used and would only use in emergencies), where you even have to move your car around because they can't make the tubing longer or make it more portable (why not???).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I tried the Tire inflator and it worked great. I really like the inflator hose screw connector ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Tire inflator and it worked great. I really like the inflator hose screw connector for the best seal and durability. The auto shut-off at the set tire pressure is great too. This unit replaces the AAA branded inflator I purchased on Amazon. The first time I tried that inflator out, the plastic lever on the inflator hose to connect it to the tire valve broke/snapped off. It was then useless. Luckily, I was just trying it out and it at home and wasn’t somewhere I really need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: John C!

customer_reviews.title: First unit had many problems. Vendor sending replacement.
customer_reviews.text: At best, this inflator fills my tires faster than any other 12v inflator. But it’s also the most frustrating to use. The touted digital display doesn’t work most of the time, the automatic stop feature which depends on the display doesn’t work at all, the light doesn’t work, and the unit needs to be unplugged and plugged in again multiple times to inflate one tire. I have troubleshot my car’s 12 volt outlet and tried the device with the engine running and not running and changed which outlet I used to no difference. This thing is very close to useless b
customer_reviews.author: RickW

customer_reviews.title: Helped me when I was in a bit of a rut.
customer_reviews.text: This was the best investment I've made all year. I had something going on with my tires, and I had to fill them up about three or four times in two months. Luckily this helped until I could get it back to the tire shop. It also works pretty fast as well. The lights on it really help me a lot. I have had to fill up in the dark at a gas station. The lighting at the gas station was no enough for me to see my tires properly.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Died After 5 Uses
customer_reviews.text: The idea of having this pump in my car gave me a great sense of security. After all, who wants to get caught at night with a low/flat tire? Out of the box, this pump worked great. But I only used it sparingly in the course of the 10 months I've had it, and probably used it a total of 5 times. Now, it doesn't work at all. It lights up, but has no indicators/ selection on the screen. I emailed the company to see if there's an obvious fix, but received no reply. This pump is not worth the money. I recommend purchasing a more reliable one so that when you need help, it will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! the plug is not correct!
customer_reviews.text: I finally got to use this on the trail and it would not make contact. i used 2 different outlets and same result. I had to unscrew the tip, (where the fuse is stored) so that it would extend further and then it just barely made contact. When it gets power, it seems like a fine product. I couldn't recommend this in this condition.
customer_reviews.author: Toddmanin AZ

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate and defected air hose locking mechanism..
customer_reviews.text: The unit is nice looking but operation is an issue: 1. The psi reading is not accurate!! After extensive testing, I realized that the psi reading is off by +2.5 psi. That's a big defect!! 2. After unit stops automatically, you unlock the plug to tire valve to remove.. it gets stuck and air will leak fast loosing at least 2-3 psi.. another big defect!! Other than that, it's just a nice looking tire air compressor to showcase in your storage room or garage. Make sure to dusted off once in a while..
customer_reviews.author: AKF312

customer_reviews.title: Great little pump
customer_reviews.text: Great pump, love that you can set a PSI and it will auto shut off at the right pressure. My only reason for not 5 stars is that one of the two large buttons comes off due to vibrations. However it fits right back on and has not affected the functionality of the button or else I would have returned it. Other than that one issue this thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This product is so good that it was stolen from my car and I bought it again! My low pressure shows because my mini is a great car and the computer sensor can tell if pressure gets low, shows which tire is low. So, I have used this machine many times, saving me from having to find a gas station with working air machines. I will buy some for my adult children. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Matthis

customer_reviews.title: Don't get your hopes inflated.
customer_reviews.text: I had great hopes for this inflation device. It is extremely compact, had wonderful features, and initially inflated our bicycle tires very quickly. And then it died...after only one use. The manufacturer sent a second and a third replacement...and they died as well...after running for only a few seconds. My money was refunded, which I appreciated, but this device has serious flaws. Great concept, just not successfully executed. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lifelong Learner

customer_reviews.title: It's Awesome While It Lasts
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed using the air pump. It is very compact and convenient. I mostly used it for filling the tires on my bike and occasionally on my car. Unfortunately, after about 9 months of use it died on me. I was filling my car tire when it abruptly shut off. Since then, the machine will not even turn on. Given the quality of use, I was really expecting better. P.I. Auto Stores claims that there is a money back guarantee but I cannot find the information for the company on Amazon or online. It was probably in the instruction manual, but after I learned how to use the unit I parted ways with that.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Tire Pressure Moniters
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this air compressor for my sister who has tire pressure monitoring devices which leak. She works at night and this air pump gives her the ability to connect it to the tire that has leaked, set the pressure and let it do its job. She is so happy because the bad tire sensor has to be ordered. Now she has a simple way to restore the tire pressure to the proper pressure until the parts come in.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: Works well great for keeping in the trunk in case of
customer_reviews.text: It works well for the price. It’s compact so doesn’t take up a large footprint in the trunk. It’s very light weight so I don’t know about long term wear and tear. Little underpowered but acceptable especially because of the price point. If I had to inflate a plethora objects I would probably go with something a little more heavy duty but if you inflate things that much you knew that already. All in all great price point, good size, little underpowered, and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Bman78

customer_reviews.title: Great little product
customer_reviews.text: I needed to keep one tire inflated to the psi listed on my car door. Rather than paying $300 for a new tire sensor, I bought this air compressor and when the tire goes low and the car signals a light on my dashboard, I just get this out, plug it in to my port and attach the top, press the button and it perfectly inflates to the set psi I put in, and turns off automatically when it fills. LOVE this, I am 63 and it works like advertised...
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: INVALUABLE
customer_reviews.text: This tire pressure gauge with inflatability has saved me, my husband, my Mom and other family members from driving on improperly inflated tires. Sometimes it's hard to find a place where they offer a tire gauge / air. And, you have to pay for it now. Ridiculous! However, buying this product is an excellent investment. And, it's easy to travel with or store. I wholeheartedly recommend this product and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: John Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Happy and would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Very easy to use and seems very accurate. "Set it and forget it", literally. Screw it onto the tire valve, set the desired pressure and let it do the work. Inflates very fast and much easier than finding a WORKING air station at a convenience store. Plus it's small enough, and comes in a case, so you can carry with on trips in case of any air pressure problems. Happy with the purchase so far and expect to be happy going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Over Drive

customer_reviews.title: Nice but
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice air pump, but it does not have a tip for clipping it to the tire valve, so you have to sort of push/hold it in place to make it work. We went to a hardware store and bought an extension to allow it to snap onto the tire valve. I mean they could not of included that for a few cents more, how utterly cheap!!!. Find a better product to spend you money on.
customer_reviews.author: L Godot

customer_reviews.title: It's junk
customer_reviews.text: It's junk. It stopped working after just two or three uses. The compartment for storing the electric cable is very small and it's difficult to get the cable in and out. I believe the power line (it's really too thin to call it cable or cord) got pinched where it goes into the housing, severing the actual wire.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2+ years, then quit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple years ago to keep a leaky tire inflated (it turned out to have two nails in it, which were eventually both removed, fixing the problem). I used it from time to time after that. Today it wouldn't turn on at all, either in my car's outlet or my wife's. I guess two years is not bad for this price, but I was hoping to get maybe 5 years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: UtilityMaximizer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Great Company
customer_reviews.text: I just tried out this product for the first time and it worked flawlessly. It is the best tire inflation device I have owned. It is quiet, it is accurate and it is quick. What more could you ask for in a product like this? I love this and at 73 years old it is going to make my life so much easier. Delivery was on time and the owner of the company writes before you receive the product to ensure you will be satisfied with and invites you to contact them if there are issues. I appreciated that and it was also an opportunity to send her a private response on how good their product is.
customer_reviews.author: Ken James

customer_reviews.title: Works well with one minor flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described and works well. I owned the previous version of it that was considerably louder than this one (this version is much quieter which is a big plus) however I rated this in the middle due to the LCD screen has ghosting issues reading the PSI. I am also unable to preset a PSI before hooking up the inflator cord to the tire valve and turning it on. Seems like it has to be turned on inflating before setting a PSI. Previous version was not like that. Otherwise, works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: RoushKid

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your engine is running before you plug in the compressor.
customer_reviews.text: What a lifesaver!!! I had a slow leak in my tire and could not get a replacement for a couple of days due to my hectic schedule. This machine was compact, super easy to use and accurate. The psi linked up with the amounts show on the tire pressure screen in the car. It was very easy to use, very fast. I also like the light eventhough I did not need it. I am happy to have this and will be taking it with me on all future road trips! It comes in a nice carrying case and I like that it also has adapters for bikes and athletic balls.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybee

customer_reviews.title: Portable Digital Auto Tire Inflator - panic saver
customer_reviews.text: I have used this device numerous times due to pressure leaks and nail punctures. I actually had a friend at work help me fix my initial flat and was impressed with the compact size and power of the pump. Easy setup and powered from the car's cigarette light. I knew I needed something like it and glad I got one on my own before my next flat. I always have it with me for the unexpected. It also has a built-in light for those extremely dark conditions on back roads or at the park. Better safe than trying to find a stranger to help out.
customer_reviews.author: NY DAD IN NM

customer_reviews.title: This device will save you time and frustration
customer_reviews.text: This device saved me a lot of frustration. I live in a cold climate where it's not unusual to see cars lined up at an air pump at the gas station. Often times, you find the air pump broken. So, I bought this devict and used it immediately. It was awseome. It quickly put air in my tires and cut off once my desired psi was hit. The power cord goes into your cigarette lighter and is plenty long enough to reach all 4 tires. It also comes in this neat little carrier the tucks nicely under the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle D. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Only works a couple of times
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on July 12, 2018. It is now November 13, 2018. Tried to use it today & it no longer works. This is the 3rd time I’ve used it. It turns on but the psi won’t load correctly & when I press the button to put air in the tire it does nothing. I WANT A REFUND
customer_reviews.author: Hg

customer_reviews.title: Saved my a**
customer_reviews.text: Last week, less than 48 hours after this was delivered, I had to use it: I was about to leave for the closing on my house, when I discovered that a front tire was flat (not low, but flat!). I was due at the closing in 20 minutes. I nearly freaked out, but opened the inflator (I hadn't even had a chance to unbox it until then). The instructions weren't complicated, and the inflator worked! I filled the tire, and was on time for the closing. What else can I say, but whew!! (I do wish I hadn't just discovered that the price is $10 lower this week, but clearly this was a worthwhile purchase, and I do recommend it!)
customer_reviews.author: obama voter

customer_reviews.title: Unit will not work on mid-sized vehicles
customer_reviews.text: This unit will work for light weight tires. Filled up my dirtbike and daughter's bicycle. Just tried to top off the tires on my GMC Canyon (small truck) and the pump would just shut down immediately. Moved to my wife's Hyundai Santa Fe sport and same thing, pump shut down immediately. Seems this pump is not powerful enough to air up tires on a vehicle. Sad because it seems like this is the target market. Sadly, after this first time using it, I'm already outside my return window. I guess I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Compact, powerful Tire Inflator
customer_reviews.text: My family has 4 cars with tires of various ages. Gas stations now charge for compressed air (if they have machines at all) and properly inflated tires improve mileage and safety. Shortly after purchasing, I developed a slow leak in one of my tires and this compact inflator kept me on the road for several weeks until I could find time to take the car in. I especially like the carrying case which helps keep the inflator valve and power cable clean.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: No longer works after only a few months!
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: after less than 10 uses, this device began to malfunction. First, the actual pressure it inflates to is at least 5 psi higher than the pressure selected in the window. Next the display started to dim so the numbers are not legible. Finally, when the compressor switch is turned on, it just sits and hums--no compression! Unfortunately, the return window has closed for me, otherwise it would be on its way back! China strikes again!
customer_reviews.author: PapaFox

customer_reviews.title: Sadly there is not a zero star rate for thi piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Another flimsy Chinese garbage.... I guess I did not read the word "disposable" in its description, because this flimsy piece of garbage only worked two (2) times to barely fill my tires in a routine checkout at home. I guess I am lucky not to realize this in a emergency situation. DO NOT BUY THIS TRASH, it just a fools fraud...
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Sevcik

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well, if at all...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to inflate my air suspension. It does not program easily (if at all), and fails to come on if you can actually get it to program correctly. You have to turn it off and on about 20 times for it to work. I only bought it replace my AAA compact inflator (that works like a champ) because of the auto shutoff feature. If that actually worked like it was supposed to I would have given 5 stars..
customer_reviews.author: R. Garwood

customer_reviews.title: This save me a lot of time!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit (the first one belongs now to my wife), and it helps when you had a flat tire or need to complete the air in one. In this version you can set the pressure at the screen and start the pump, when it gets the adequate pressure it's stop for himself, this help you to not over inflate your tires. It's quiet for his capacity (compared with other brands), fast and reliable with the tire pressure that show at the screen. So far I had not the opportunity to try the lights features (thanks God for that). But it looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Alberto Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Limit to PSI 35.5
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a 2019 Mini. My tire sensors read low and the I needed the Air Comptressor to tresolve this issue. I was dissapointed to see that my new unit stopped at a PSI of 35.5. Is this a safety function for this unit or a one off for the unit I was shipped. Planning on returning the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime J Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, broke first use, dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Had put it in my car for emergencies. Finally used it to inflate my tire. Was leary of the cheap plastic tip. Worked, took much longer than expected but not a problem. Then will I had it out I inserted the attachment to fill balls, took about 3 minutes to inflate a child’s soccer ball, again just slow not a problem, then when I tried to remove the attachment the plastic fell apart and the ball filler became stuck inside behind some gasket that dislodged itself. Of course this is past the return period as I didn’t buy it to use it regularly. Either way, cheap product, watch out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it the first time out of the bag for bicycle and car tires so I can't comment on durability but it works as advertised and is very simple to use. Far as I can tell it is well built and should last. I've got a trail bike with a presta valve that takes a while to pump up using my road bike hand pump but it is a breeze with this compressor. Between that and checking all of my tires as long as I had it out I did about everything with it and it all worked well. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: William Schubert

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have had several chances to use this tire inflator on different cars. It fills the tires quickly and does not jump all over the place and get hot like cheap tire inflators. I believe the gas stations in my state are supposed to provide free air but I have found too many stations have broken compressors or clerks that give you a blank look when you ask them to turn the compressor on. Since I have used my tire inflator under emergency conditions, I can also say there is no substitute for having this gadget on hand when you need it. The case is a nice touch and it fits neatly in the tool bag in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: 5Star

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Convenience and Super Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Ultimate convenience - and really easy to use. Just used this for the first time - and it was exceptional. The cord from the 12v could be a little longer for convenience only, but it worked great. I ordered the extension to make it even easier, and am considering the 12v / 110 converter. It comes with a little case that isn't very durable - but who cares. For a convenient, easy-to-use air compressor for up to 35 PSI --- this is exceptional for the cost. This would make a great gift for a traveler or anyone on the road most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful knowing I won’t be stranded by s flat tire!
customer_reviews.text: What a lifesaver this is! I bought it originally to inflate my bike tires. But tonight a friend had a flat and when she put on the spare, it was flat, too. I took the inflator out of my car, attached the nozzle to the valve stem, connected the cord to the car’s lighter, pressed a button and stopped when the read out indicated 33 psi. In five minutes, she was on her way. Her husband was stunned a 80 y/o woman was able to fix a flat so easily. Great help to know I won’t be stranded by a flat tire.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought. The first works but does not read the tire pressure anymore. So I got another that's updated in the controls. But it sucks!! Too late to return it. It will shut off on psi way before it fills the tire. Then you can't even override the sotting to make it keep inflating! Reads the pressure, but won't let you keep putting air in, so I can use my tire gauge! This is a piece of junk that I am stuck with don't buy this people! I gave them a second chance and got screwed again.
customer_reviews.author: BoBo

customer_reviews.title: Works great upon first use
customer_reviews.text: A lot of thought was put into this product: Nice size Does shut off after reaching set pressure backlit so easy to read at night to light is perfectly positioned can be flat or horizontal don't need to screw it onto valve stem fitment on valve stem is pretty tight making it tough to remove
customer_reviews.author: Todd F. FAIR, HONEST REVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: Works for Car Tires
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this is how these things work, but the unit I have displays varying PSI when you are inflating a car tire. Say you are going for 35PSI, and you are at 18, it will display 19 for a second, then 18, then 17, then 19.5, then 17, then 18, then 20, 19, 17.5, 20.5... basically, it trends up over time but shows lower numbers throughout the process rather than a steady climbing number. I thought I was losing air the first time I used it. Takes probably 5 minutes to go from 18 to 35 PSI so its not a fast process but it's surprisingly small and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Shed

customer_reviews.title: perhaps for smaller vehicles
customer_reviews.text: this is rated for 150 psi, but will not fill my truck tires to 75psi. The other day I started with 73psi, turned the device on to 76psi...walked away came back a couple minutes later and it was down to 59psi. verified correct connection, the device is just not powerful enough for larger vechicles.
customer_reviews.author: bWILs72

customer_reviews.title: Piece Of Junk! Doesn’t work at all! Useless!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace a manual pump I had. I received it about 3-4 days ago but had not had a chance to try it out. Well today I finally had time and I’m so disappointed because it doesn’t even work at all. It doesn’t come on at all. This is a piece of junk! I will be returning it to Amazon for a refund!
customer_reviews.author: P. M. James

customer_reviews.title: This air compressor is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: It is so convenient and easy to use! I LOVE IT! You don't have to screw on the air hose to the tire, instead it clamps on which is much better and it's got a really convenient carry case that's really nice, well made and the compressor fits in there perfectly. There are NO dislikes! Great price too! Don't look any further than this compressor. Buy it. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Ditte

customer_reviews.title: A necessary Tool that works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this compressor over two years ago because I'm on the road a lot and if I need air its right in my car. Everyone should have a 12v compressor on board. You can get a slow leak and this solves the issue easily. It happened to me the first year I had it right after I bought brand new tires at Costco. I noticed some have had problems but I have not had any at all. Maybe God is blessing me again...
customer_reviews.author: Desert Sage

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I was so tired of going to the garage to have them put air in my tires. This is so easy to use and works wonderful. I love the idea that it has the light and the flashing light. I feel safer knowing that if my car breaks down I can use the light until someone gets there. You set the psi so there is no guessing or having to use a tire guage. It comes with a nice case and fits great in my trunk as it is compact. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Wish I choose something else
customer_reviews.text: A Bit flimsy, doesn't feel solid at all. It does seem to work on car tires, however, I just tried to pump up a standard bike tire and it didn't seems to properly recognize the correct pressure in the tire and kept stopping. I wish the build was a more solid, as its feels like if you drop it it would shatter. In addition the tire connector is mostly made of plastic and is already showing signs of wear after less than a dozen uses. If you like well built things you may be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Adam O Braxton

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient and Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I hate filling up my tires at the gas station and there aren't any full service stations close to my house. I have used this once so far and just like other reviewers said, it is quite loud so I just make sure to use it during the day so I don't upset my neighbors. You do need to set it to a few psi over your target psi to offset the amount of air lost when detaching the hose. So far so good, I've had 3 friends borrow it already.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and to store!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other tire (cheaper) inflators and found the design to be flawed, e.g., difficult to wrap up the hose and store the unit. The P.I. unit not only inflates your tires (& equipment) but also stores nicely in your car: everything is easy to put back in place and they even provide a nice bag to keep it from getting scuffed. Even if your storage space is tight (I have a mini cooper) it will fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: rdf

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few times and it is not working any more. Seems the electrical cord has problem. I cautiously bought two at the beginning, kept this one,but now I deeply Regret! Don't waste your money. UPDATE: The PI Store customer service contacted me. They refund and sent me their new model for free. So far I haven't find the chance to try the new one yet, but I will update again to write an honest fair review. For their attitude and dedicate spirit I want to give 4 Star first. Thank you very much for being such a good company for paying extraordinary efforts on providing better customers experience.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Works great and convenient nozzle attachment.
customer_reviews.text: Got it last week. Used it to inflate both golf cart tires and bicycle tires with PSI ranges from 20 to 65. Worked really well. I found the screw on nozzle to be especially convenient. There was a bit of air loss but probably no more than in a conventional nozzle. 5 Stars for the quality and effectiveness of the pump and also 5 stars for customer service. I noted a slight defect in my original unit and Yolanda immediately insisted on sending out a replacement. Not at all necessary but impressive customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Huberty

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This portable air compressor is so easy to use! It can be plugged into the cigarette lighter socket in your car and can reach all tires with no problem. I have to put air in my lawn mower tires so this can also be plugged into an adapter and used in an electric outlet in any building. It is lightweight, easy to carry and has a case to put it in.The numbers on the gauge let you know how much air is already in the tire and how much you are putting in. You can set it to stop at a certain psi or just stop it manually. Great gadget to have.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, results in auto-shutoff
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the electrical cable is poor and loose as if every cable bend decreases quality of current flowing through. Why does that matter? The pump shuts off automatically if it is not getting enough power. From the connection at the cigarette lighter to the cable itself...it is poor quality. When it works it is great, but when needed during an emergency I need reliability.
customer_reviews.author: ChiliPepper

customer_reviews.title: Love this air pump
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific device and very easy to use. You plug it into the cigarette lighter. Snap the hose onto the tire stem and hit a button. Takes about a minute, if that, to inflate the tire. There is a bit of a difference between the readings. Machine says 36.5; my car’s tire monitor says 34. I can live with that. I’m a girl nerding out over this.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Halliburton

customer_reviews.title: Tough to beat this design
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in mid-Aug 2016. So far, have used twice and it has worked well. What I love about this unit: 1) lays flat so it doesn't tip over or vibrate across the pavement like other units I have tried; 2) auto shut-off; 3) it is fast!; 4) easy to put the cords into the built-in cubby and everything fits neatly into the case. The only thing keeping me from a 5-star review is that I believe the power cord may be too short for long-body vehicles. I had no issues with a mid-size sedan, but I did use a fair amount of the slack. It sounds like the manufacturer addressed this so I must have received an earlier model.
customer_reviews.author: Squishy

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a number of times and it's worked well. Definitely worth carrying in your vehicle. Take note: The instructions state that you should let it cool down for a few minutes after 10 mins of continuous use. I didn't read the directions before the first use and actually ran it for about twice that long. No damage or anything but something good to know if you're like me and don't crack open the booklet unless there's a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ray A. - independent & unsolicited reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service completely resolved my problem.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 4 of these units, one needed replacing after about 5 years. I gave 1 away as a gift and carry the other one in my truck. I don’t go anywhere without the PIAuto Store Compressor. It is a little touchy, but always ends up working. The last one I ordered was defective when first used ( 5 months after purchase) and the company replaced it with no questions asked. . I continue to be very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Geovjian

customer_reviews.title: Update to formerly bad review.
customer_reviews.text: Compressor worked for a few minutes then stopped. Returning this item. Seller contacted me and offered to resolve the issue so I am very happy with that. I already returned it for a refund but I am impressed that they took the time to contact me.
customer_reviews.author: William E Bennett

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and gets the job DONE when my ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a home health practitioner so I drive a LOT. Sometimes 7 days a week and I often travel in construction zones ending up with slow leaks or flat tires. This product is compact, lightweight, portable, easy to use and gets the job DONE when my idiot light toes off on the dashboard, I plug it ing, put it to work and it keeps me on the road until I can get the tire repaired on MY time.
customer_reviews.author: dorie k.

customer_reviews.title: Owned For Over A Year
customer_reviews.text: Bought the unit sometime in early 2019. I used it at least three times within a year. It still works, and does a phenomenal job airing up my tires and my parent's vehicles. I store mine in the closet, because I'm worried leaving it in the car could damage it. Remember, it can get over 100 degrees inside a vehicle on a particularly hot day. I recommended it. It only comes with a socket for car cigarette lighters. But, I have no complaints, it works and it is worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Poor reliability in the power cord
customer_reviews.text: It died the third time I tried to use it - wouldn't power on. Upon inspection it appears that the power cable frays badly at the car adapter plug. Photo attached to show the damage. Was always carefully stored in the trunk of my car in its original traveling case.
customer_reviews.author: Coral O’Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. It's very nice that the unit stops automatically at the preset PSI. I double check with a digital gauge and it's accurate (or I guess both could be wrong). Either way, car reports the same PSI. Great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Still works great after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong in December 2019 (bought in 2017), and just saved me with a flat on the road. Had to pump up the spare tire that was at 15 PSI to 60PSI. Love this little thing. Use it every month or two on our cars and it does its job. Flashlight has come in handy in the winter months to find the gasket on the tire when it's dark out. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: coY

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy product and has saved me time and quarters from gas stations. It’s definitely a sense of security knowing I can fill my car or bike tires at home or anywhere. I really being able to set the psi and it will auto stop once reached. I didn’t rate it a 5 because the storage case should be a bit bigger. I can’t get the cords packed neatly into the case because it fits like a glove the compressor.
customer_reviews.author: TraceyX

customer_reviews.title: Not like the last one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad a few years ago and it made his life so much easier I decided to buy it myself. I went to my previous purchases and just repurchased it. No decisions needed, I knew this was what I wanted. It's, unfortunately, not the same. For my dad's, you set the PSI you want it to fill to and it automatically turns off. This either isn't doesn't have that functionality or it doesn't work properly. Still fills tires just fine but not as easily as it used to.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H

customer_reviews.title: Not Entirely Happy
customer_reviews.text: Have had 3 occasions now to use this pump. Each time when I turned it on, it would shut right off. Once it ran, it worked fine. But it leaves me feeling it will break soon. I have one leaky tire that no one can figure out why it loses air. That is the reason I purchased this. Came highly recommended. It's small so it fits in the consul of my vehicle. Just wary it may break because of the lack of starting each time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works in a Pinch
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of trying to find an air pump at a gas station when I had a low tire pressure warning. I bought this to always have the option of doing it at home. Overall it works pretty well. It is a little slow in bringing the tire up to pressure, and the built in digital pressure gauge is not alway accurate, but it works when you have no other options. I recommend buying a needle gauge tire pressure gauge to check the tire pressure instead of relying on the digital one on the pump.
customer_reviews.author: FCCM Thomas Lohr

customer_reviews.title: Buy the older basic model. This one didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: It was the first time I had to use this pump today. It made noises but it didn't inflate my car tire. The nozzle is a plastic weird material and the plunger to push the internal shrader valve is plastic and flimsy. It's a shame because I have the older one and it works lovely. I am very unsatisfied with this newer model. I would recommend the standard model. Update: I may have gotten a bad bug or maybe a lemon. Amazon and pi reached out to me. Supreme customer service 100% happy with their follow up
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome air pump
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical how well this would work. I have low profile tires and they seem to be more susceptible to the cold air which lowers pressure. I got tired of constantly going to the station to ad 5 or 6 lbs of air. Plus trying to judge when you have the right amount is tricky too. This thing makes it super simple, just set the number of lbs you want and pump away. A great value for the money. Super compact, you shouldn't have a car without one of these in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy !
customer_reviews.text: No woman who drives alone alot should be without this. Airs up slow leaks and flats, will fillup a donut or spare. Excellent for bikes and pilates balls. Will keep tire pressure up if you MUST use fix-a-flat and and go a long distance for help. Great product to pair with a jump box for your battery and you are ready to go without counting on stranger help!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Stover

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much, I bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: This unit works well, and packs up into a nice compact package that fits in the case supplied with the inflator. Just plug the power cable into the outlet in the car, start the engine, and hook the air from the pump to the tire valve. Soon your tire will be back up to pressure. Then, pack it away until next time. I liked this so well, I bought it twice! My daughter was visiting and having tire issues: I gave he mine, but made sure to order the exact same one again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Edward Fenstermacher

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tired inflator. My low inflation light on my car kept coming on, and I was frustrated because I find it a pain to have to use a gas station air compressor (and PAY to use it). The inflator is compact, and gets the job done. I'm very impressed. I also insisted on a digital inflator, and while some reviews were a little skeptical about the digital feature, I don't have any problems. Also, my low inflation light has stopped constantly turning on too, but I can't say that's because of the inflator, but the convenience of having the inflator available 24/7 means I can always be certain my tires are properly inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Tickbit

customer_reviews.title: Don't get flattened by life, get this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best air compressor I've used for this price point. Meant to review it sooner and just aired up GFS car which was completely flat. To get it at about 25psi took 2 minutes or less from being at 7psi just to pull it in the garage to change it out. I like that it shows you what you're at as it goes and that you can preset what level you want it to kick off at. I haven't used the flashlight, but I'm sure it'll come in handy. I'm happy with this compressor thus far and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: B-Mackin

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is an update to my previous negative review, after being contacted by pi auto stores they made things right and replaced the previous damaged air compressor which resulted in my giving this outstanding company five stars!! Tremendous customer service as well and I refer family and friends to them!!
customer_reviews.author: MDE 205

customer_reviews.title: OK for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This inflator is not the easiest to use but so far appears to be a good value for the price I paid. My biggest complaint is that its not intuitive to use right out of the box. Need to carefully read the direction, that are not all that clear, in order to understand all the futures. I've read some negative reviews suggesting it is short on longevity, but only time will tell. So far its been fairly easy to use once I read the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Al Binder

product_meta.title: P.I. AUTO STORE Premium Air Compressor Tire Inflator for Automobiles and Bikes. Portable 12V DC Electric Car Tire Pump, Auto Shut Off, Digital Pressure Gauge, LED Light. New improved version
feature_bullets: PREMIUM FEATURES – New 2019 Improved Air Compressor with powerful pump generating 38 l/min air-flow. Can inflate a mid-sized car tire from flat to 30 Psi in under 3 minutes with Auto Shut Off. Digital Tire Pressure Gauge with large LCD display. Super Bright 100 Lumens LED light and Red SOS Light to be used in roadside emergency situations.

VERY SIMPLE TO USE – Plug into your 12 Volt cigarette lighter socket or other 12 V outlet. Easily set pressure on the large backlit LCD display gauge, connect to tire valve with the snap on quick connector. Microprocessor monitors tire pressure and will automatically stop at your set pressure. This removes the need to keep checking the pressure and avoids over inflation.

COMPACT ROBUST DESIGN - Compact design and Storage Case make it ideal for storage in your trunk. You never know when you will need it in an emergency. Longer hose and cables are fully integrated into housing. Fused to protect vehicle

VERSATILE - Best for Car, Bicycle, Motorbike, RV, SUV, ATV (Not for Trucks). Also, Sports Equipment and inflatables (adaptors included). Connect to household supply with our AC/DC Converter (must be purchased separately - see offer)
INCLUDED – Carry Case, 4 Spare Dust Caps, Schrader to Presta valve adaptor for bicycles tires and an exclusive Digital Guide to Tire Care.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars4,117 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
